name: Conversing with children of Morpheus
description:
composition of two analog pieces using mixed media (watercolor, ink, graphic markers, coffee and pen)

The Somnia crew walks with us down the hypnagogic paths and into the deep dreamlands where we speak in languages that are as old as life. Strange yet deeply familiar. In the lands of Morpheus the lines and forms become fluid and morph into each other, the portals open across dimensions and beings of all shapes appear. Are they my friends, messengers, guardians - or are they my own faces in Morpheus' mirror?
